Burundi - Évaluation D'un Projet de
            Développement de la Pêche

abstracts.cdata!:
Project components include: (a)
            provision of fishing materials and equipment to fishermen;
            (b) development and expansion of fishing centers and
            stations; (c) improvement of fish marketing; (d)
            strengthening of fisheries extension services and training
            for fishermen; (e) construction and equipping of
            headquarters facilities for the RDS; (f) studies and pilot
            development activities for the Lake Tanganyika coastal
            region; (g) technical assistance, including training,
            studies and preparation of future projects.
